# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an appearance object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a tab bar item appearance object

- **init(style:)**: Creates an appearance object with appropriate default values for a tab bar, displaying its items with the specified layout style.
- **init()**: Creates an appearance object with default values for a stacked tab bar item.

items.description: Creates an appearance object with appropriate default values for a tab bar, displaying its items with the specified layout style.
